title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 835.8 - Consolidation of hearings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 835.8 - Consolidation of hearings

State Regulations

Following such informal conferences as may be held, to the
extent that the same or similar grounds for objections are raised by one or
more objectors, the executive director may in his discretion, and with the
consent of the objectors, cause a consolidated hearing to be scheduled at which
two or more objectors asserting that ground may be heard. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
835.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
